name: Martha Madison: Simple Machines Volume 1
description: Transform your room into a science lab and go bonkers with Martha Madison: Simple Machines Volume 1. Players, as virtual scientists, work alone or collaboratively with a partner to use screws, inclined planes and wedges to solve physics puzzles and challenges.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 or higher Processor: Intel Atom x5-Z8350 1.44GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 3000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 8.1, 10 Processor: Intel Core i5 2.6GHz or better Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: Intel HD 4000 or better DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 200 MB available space
